mentoringChart.sessionsMentoredPerTrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the Mentoring Chart legend entry representing sessions mentored per track.
**UI Location**: Journey Overview → Mentoring Section → Mentoring Chart (tooltip/dataset label)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the mentoring chart.
**Technical Context**: This is a label for a chart dataset. It does not contain variables.
**Current English**: "Sessions mentored per track"
trackSummary.session:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the count of sessions for a specific track, with correct pluralization.
**UI Location**: Journey Overview → Mentoring Section → Track Summary (below track title)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the summary for a specific mentored track.
**Technical Context**: Variable `count` must remain unchanged and is used for pluralization.
**Current English**: "{track.numDiscussions} session" (or "sessions" pluralized)
sessionsMentoredSummary.totalSessionsMen:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating the total number of mentoring sessions completed.
**UI Location**: Journey Overview → Mentoring Section → Total Sessions Mentored summary box
**When Users See This**: When viewing the mentoring summary statistics.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Total sessions mentored"
sessionRatioSummary.sessionsPerStudent:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating the average number of sessions per student.
**UI Location**: Journey Overview → Mentoring Section → Sessions per Student summary box
**When Users See This**: When viewing the mentoring summary statistics.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Sessions per student"
studentsMentoredSummary.totalStudentsMen:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating the total number of unique students mentored.
**UI Location**: Journey Overview → Mentoring Section → Total Students Mentored summary box
**When Users See This**: When viewing the mentoring summary statistics.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Total students mentored"
